creator: Oly Bible
descriptionHtml:
Concluding the words of Lord in both Old and New Testament in the Holy Scriptures that one can share to friends and relatives and listen to get good habits in life. Over the reading, if don’t know a word meaning no worries, New Revised Standard Version bible consists of dictionary where one can get the exact sense of the sentence.
There is a section of Quotes in NRSV Study Bible where one can share the visually appealing background with each of verse numbers along proverb through social media network. Based on the study, to check the correctness of divine knowledge learned there is an availability of quiz section in New Revised Standard Study Bible where one can test their understanding level of bible. There is always a pocket version of lord wordings in the name of New Revised Standard Bible Apps that showcase one’s right path by enlighten their mind and heart with pure soul.
The Psalm of god becomes part of the daily life with NRSV Bible reading atleast one Verse a day can bring a vibrant change in your life. New Revised Standard Bible “Daily Verse” of the day automatically does this job by having a notification over the drawing menu bar of the Android phone’s home screen window.
NRSV Bible Online marks only a limited data packet connectivity to operate on displaying the wallpaper, highlighting videos of Gods advice, and so on in the list. New Revised Standard Bible Online makes the reading live and study the living habitual of individual directly from the speech of Lord Jesus marking how one should lead their life.
Video descriptions of god’s story on bible are listed under each respective category based upon seasons bring the living way of life in simple wordings, the discipline. One can mark favorites in “My Library” sections of New Revised Standard Version of Bible Online through adding the interested verse to the queue for later reading or even refer to it. Finally, the feature is said to be NRSV Bible “Calendar” where it shows the festive events of Christianity with marked day of the month sequentially.
Overall the functions are easy to operate on Oly bible’s NRSV bible app with available both online and offline (with some options disabled) and everything we discussed in the palm of hand for daily reference through Android mobile application. In English Bible NRSV, go on here with options such as Dark Mode, Font Selection, Theme, Notification, and much more to see in the app.
Book of Psalms New Revised Standard Version, there are different versions of bible but this one represented to be among the oldest and standard version that have recorded the Lord Jesus direct sayings to live a life of triumph from the daily readings.
descriptionShort: New Revised Standard Bible- Read NRSV holy bible orderly with Chapters & Verses.

title: New Revised Standard Version

creator: Oly Bible
descriptionHtml:
Concluding the Lord's words in the Old and New Testament in the Holy Scriptures that one can share with friends and relatives and listen to get good habits in life. Over the reading, if you don't know a word's meaning, no worries; the New Revised Standard Bible consists of a dictionary where one can get the same sense of the sentence.

There is always a pocket version of the Lord's wordings in the name of New Revised Standard Bible Apps that showcase one's proper path by enlightening their mind and heart with pure soul. The Psalm of God becomes part of daily life with NSRV Bible reading at least one Verse a day can bring a vibrant change in your life. NSRV Bible marks only a limited data packet connectivity to operate on displaying the wallpaper, highlighting videos of God's advice, and so on in the list.

Overall, the functions are easy to operate on Oly bible's NSRV bible app, both online and offline (with some options disabled). Everything we discussed is in the palm of one's hand for daily reference through the Android mobile application.

Features:

Quotes: Define the verses in different sections placed over an image that the user can use severally.

Videos: Play the wordings of God Jesus and become a disciple of him in the video format.

Wallpapers: The image that can fill as a colorful background on the main screen of your phone /Tablet representing the occasion of Gods and festivals.

Search: Looking out for a particular word search, then the result would bring matching in a marked visual of the whole Bible or New Testament or Old Testament.

Daily Verse: Start each of your days with the random verse that appears on the Holy Bible app, where it can be copied and shared.

My Library: Bookmark, Highlights, and Notes are a collection of titles.
  • Bookmark → Used to bookmark or save a verse.

  • Highlights → Used to color theme a verse

  • Notes → Used to take or mark some notes on a verse


Festive Calendar: Let us know about all the Christian festivals and events in this Calendar. Instantly share an image with an attached verse to others in WhatsApp and save it in Gallery.

App Settings:

Dark Mode: Make the bible reading in the dark mode with text inversed in white color and background color in black.

Font Settings: Kindly Select the Font Family and set the Font size in the application.

Themes: Change the color theme of the complete application from the available color palette.

Notification Alarm: Set the verse on a daily alarm that one is notified at a particular time.

Reset: It repositions all the settings changes alone to the default one.
descriptionShort: New Revised Standard Bible- Read NRSV holy bible orderly with Chapters & Verses.
